profileAlternative.name: GaganDeep Sachdeva
profileAlternative.headline: mongoDB APAC - Singapore - Southeast Asia - Database Service on Cloud - Software Licensing - Enterprise Sales
profileAlternative.summary:
Progressive 10+ Years of experience in "Technology Sales & Business Development"​ wherein effectively managed Account Relationships across APAC (India, Singapore, Malaysia).

Global exposure of steering Enterprise business for International markets spanning Australia-NZ, JAPAC, EMEA (UK & Nordics) and North Americas - Canada while working for leading technology companies with proven proficiency in executing Direct & Indirect deals.

Successfully completed Master’s in Biotech (2007) followed by Master's in International Business Management (PGDM-2013) & a certification in "Rack-space Cloud computing" (2014)

Core Expertise:

Enterprise Software Sales & Business Development
Alliances & Channel Management
Customer Relationship & Account Management
Effective implementation of GTM strategy in developing markets

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
Promoted to Account Executive (AE) role for managing Enterprise Accounts across Singapore and Malaysia.

Help customers learn more about mongoDB and drive technology's adoption by conducting Technical Workshops, Webinars, On-Site Enablement Sessions, Hackathon and participation at industry events in the region.

As an AE, responsible for managing End to End sales process starting from understanding customers business requirements and then aligning the right resources as per their initiatives which can lead to a deal closure.


You can reach me at - gagandeep.sachdeva@mongodb.com for any queries related to MongoDB.
…
see more

MongoDB (from huMONGOus) is a document-oriented Intelligent Database Platform which has robust capabilities to run for modern application needs.

roles.title: Corporate Account Executive - India and Singapore

positions.title: Oracle
positions.description:
Got internally promoted for managing India, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka business for Oracle's (MySQL) Database Enterprise Subscriptions & ISV / OEM Licensing (Embedded).

Entrusted for delivering business of both "Net New & Renewal Sales"​ wherein had a stellar growth in terms of revenue as well as adding new logos while ensuring highest renewal rate (>80%) across APAC region.

Helping the customers via consultative selling of MySQL support offerings & licenses (Perpetual / Annual Subscriptions) wherein primarily fulfilling the transactions through Oracle's Alliances & Channels partners based out of India.

Mentoring & conducting training for team of sales reps. covering different facets in terms of product knowledge, Sales, Account management & navigating through Business processes of Oracle.

given.text: I've had the privilege of working with Gagan for about 4 years. He has good knowledge on India enterprise sales. He used to submit clean order package for booking and was very spontaneous in responding to queries raised from internal teams. He is a good asset to the team.

It was a pleasure working with Gagan. He carries a great voltage of energy.The key thing of Gagan is his attitude towards the work. The way, he take things with a calm mind and always ready to help others differentiate him from others.Super control on the accounts and sensing the requirement pre hand and finally turning them into profitable orders for the company is something I have always found in him. He is definitely one of the best persons I have worked so far.
…
See more

Gagandeep has been a great asset for MySQL business in India. We have worked closely for couple of years now and he has always shown his exceptional relationship building skills with customers & partners. With a great understanding of business challenges of his customers he can always be an ideal resource for any organization looking for an experienced Technical Sales person.
…
See more

I had the pleasure to work with Gagandeep when he was in Oracle Direct. He's a experienced and dedicated sales professional. Gagandeep will be a good asset for any company seeking an experienced sales person.

Gadandeep has supported me this past year, handling the inside sales role for MySQL Australia & New Zealand. He diligently follows through paying particular attention to customer requirements and developing a personal relationship with the customer - even though it is being done remotely. G's attitude is always positive and he brings with him the confidence to succeed in the sales assignments given to him. A delight to work with and an asset to my sales team.
…
See more
Gagan transitioned very quickly from a lead development to closing sales role, delivering great results in both roles. He is diligent and needs very little supervision. Great team player.

A Professional guy with good IT Sales experience & an excellent person when it comes to strategically work on a business idea. Gagandeep has a knack to build productive relationship with customers, business partners & colleagues.As a sales professional he has a good control on key accounts which finally turns into profitable orders for the company. It is a pleasure working with him & he can be a strong asset for any organization he would work for in future.
…
See more

Gagan is a dedicated sales professional with a keen eye for details and good understanding of IT and business, which he consistently puts to good use by generating a steady flow of opportunities. Although I’ve only been working with Gagan for a period of 6 months, he was always in good spirits, quick to engage and contribute to the success of the Nordic MySQL sales team. I wish him the best of luck with his well deserved promotion.
…
See more

Gagadeep is a true professional and prepared for a sales Role. He was one of the best BDC in my team and always overachieved his numbers . He is a great resource - smart, organized, and dedicated. He works incredibly hard to make sure he meets his targets. His efforts in FY13 in BDC role was outstanding .He goes above and beyond his prescribed role playing a key role in mentoring the team and helping the team mates.
…
See more

In his role as a Business Development Consultant, GaganDeep showed great knowledge of solution/customer qualification, proved himself to be a good resource for lead generation and was always up to speed with market trends, internal business processes without losing sight of strategic objectives.

I have been working with Gagan for several years in the Nordic region and I can recommend Gagan Deep Sachdeva as a person with great recognition and deep education of business solutions. Broad-minded, always punctual and precise employee. He denotes an in-depth understanding of modern IT technologies.

received.text: Pleasure working with Kaushal at MongoDB India. He is a person with strong ownership of his work and drive for results all the time. He addresses everything from the big picture to the details while interacting with the customers. He will be a strong team player for any sales organisation he works for and Wish him Best of everything!

Megha has been instrumental in building MySQL's India business for last 5 years & has helped various customers/prospects with her deep understanding around databases. She is a fantastic Pre-Sales professional any organisation would like to have as she carries a blend of thorough technical knowledge along-with a keen mindset for generating revenue. Always a pleasure to work with you!

items: Top CAE APAC FY19 and MongoDB Excellence Club

MEDDPICC and Command Of Message by Force Management
